title: Howard Hawks' His Girl Friday (1940) She learned about men from Cary Grant! Rom-Com

sources.title: Howard Hawks' His Girl Friday (1940) She learned about men from Cary Grant! Rom-Com
sources.description:
A runaway reporter and her scheming ex-boss chase a scoop, they crack more than just headlines‚Äîthey reignite sparks in this lightning-fast battle of wits!
Star reporter Hildy Johnson tries to quit journalism for marriage, but her editor/ex-husband Walter Burns lures her back with a sensational story: saving a condemned man from the gallows. As Walter sabotages Hildy‚Äôs engagement, they race to expose corruption while trading rapid-fire banter in a newsroom circus.

Original Title: His Girl Friday (1940) | AKA: The Front Page

Black & white version: https://youtu.be/wEx-z1TYPKU
